Hi: This is a quick guide explaining some areas of the mod and how they work

biome.seasons: Consider 'dry' as similar to usual summer, and 'wet' similar to spring.

data.fishing: '/data/fishing/fishing.json' has all the fisher loot table on it. Inside itself there are instructions on how it works

material_tags.hangable: Used for fish that can be stocked (hang) on the fish rack
material_tags.mermaid_radar: This item will be tracked in the mermaid quest. If the player have too many of these, it will trigger her. Usually for fish and other water resources
